After Kandachi performs the necessary [[hand seals]], the Conch King uses one or more of its [[chakra]] tongues to whip or restrain the opponent. The user can also pump their chakra into the Conch King increasing the tongue's length and speed. It is shown that repeated hits with the tongue can eventually kill the victim.

[[es:Arte Ninja: Látigo de Concha]]
[[fr:Fouet de Conch]]
